title: FULL SPEED AHEAD!
body:
Holy crap! I haven't written a post in quite awhile, mainly because I've been working 15 hour days trying to get everything finished by Wednesday. It's going to be close, but I think we can pull it off. Everything that's required to show movies and sell concessions will be finished by Wednesday. The other stuff, like curtains, holes in the wall, hand rails, etc, may take a few extra days.

Uh oh, I'm needed in the booth. More to come!
author: Dan
